sg.edu.smu.ecology.connector.bluetooth

Class BluetoothServerConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.smu.ecology.connector.bluetooth.BluetoothServerConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Handler.Callback, Connector

    public class BluetoothServerConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps the device to act as a server to establish bluetooth connections with other client devices in the ecology
